alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 2:58AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and northeastern Scott Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Echo, or 9 miles west of Booneville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Magazine... Echo... Barber... Lucas... Sugar Grove... Carolan... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... Ione... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
